Omaha.Horseshoe Council Bluffs: Horseshoe Council Bluffs is a hotel and casino located in Council Bluffs, Iowa near Omaha, Nebraska. It is owned and operated by Caesars Entertainment Corporation. It has 68,000 sq ft (6,300 m2) of gaming space, 1900 slot machines, 62 table games, a WSOP poker room and accommodations through Hilton Garden Inn, the local Country Inns & Suites, Holiday Inn Express and SpringHill Suites.
